title: Here’s a Curveball: What About Pressly for Series M.V.P.?
description: No player has enhanced his team’s chances of winning the World Series more than Ryan Presley, whose hellacious breaking pitches have Houston on the cusp of a title.
dc:creator: Ben Shpigel
media:description: Ryan Pressly has been sensational throughout the playoffs. According to one statistic, he has aided Houston’s pursuit of a championship more than any other player.
